## Chess.inDraw() method

Returns true or false if the game is drawn (50-move rule or insufficient material).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inDraw(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

## Example


```js
const chess = new Chess('4k3/4P3/4K3/8/8/8/8/8 b - - 0 78')
chess.inDraw()
// -> true

```
